TopicTitle: KSPI ArcJet rcs do not provide thrust when Principia mod is used

Articles.Content: Not sure where to raise this problem, but decided that KSPI is better place because it is a less global mod than Principia. Anyway whenever Principia(https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/162200-wip131-143-principia—version-dedekind-released-2018-06-13—n-body-and-extended-body-gravitation-axial-tilt/) is installed (a drop in, not in ckan) ArcJet RCS based components stop providing linear thrust ('h' and 'n' keys in rcs mode) but rotational (torque) works just fine.

On 7/2/2018 at 2:17 PM, Senaurus said:

Not sure where to raise this problem, but decided that KSPI is better place because it is a less global mod than Principia. Anyway whenever Principia(https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/162200-wip131-143-principia—version-dedekind-released-2018-06-13—n-body-and-extended-body-gravitation-axial-tilt/) is installed (a drop in, not in ckan) ArcJet RCS based components stop providing linear thrust ('h' and 'n' keys in rcs mode) but rotational (torque) works just fine.

Is this still an issue?
